task: 仅在 https://chat.deepseek.com 页面操作，禁止访问 chrome://inspect。先使用 list_pages 和 select_page 各1次锁定该页面；随后仅调用一次 evaluate_script，并原样使用以下函数源码作为参数：function() { const text="请搜索NemoVideo这家公司的信息"; const findEl=()=>{ const sels=["textarea","[contenteditable=\"true\"]","[role=\"textbox\"]","input[type=\"text\"]",".ProseMirror","div[aria-label]\,div[placeholder]"]; for (const s of sels){ const el=document.querySelector(s); if(el) return el; } const all=Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('*')); return all.find(e=>e.isContentEditable)||null; }; const el=findEl(); if(!el){ return {ok:false,msg:"no input found"}; } el.focus(); const setValue=(node,val)=>{ const tag=(node.tagName||"").toLowerCase(); if(tag==="textarea" || (tag==="input" && node.type==="text")){ const proto= tag==="textarea"? HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype : HTMLInputElement.prototype; const desc=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(proto,"value"); if(desc && desc.set){ desc.set.call(node,val); } else { node.value=val; } } else if(node.isContentEditable){ const range=document.createRange(); range.selectNodeContents(node); range.deleteContents(); node.textContent=val; } else { node.textContent=val; } }; setValue(el,text); const dispatch=(target,type,init)=> target.dispatchEvent(new Event(type,{bubbles:true,cancelable:true,...(init||{})})); dispatch(el,"input"); dispatch(el,"change"); el.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent("keydown",{key:"Enter",code:"Enter",bubbles:true})); el.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent("keyup",{key:"Enter",code:"Enter",bubbles:true})); return {ok:true, tag:el.tagName, contenteditable:!!el.isContentEditable}; }。执行成功后立即结束，禁止任何提交后的状态复核或再次调用其他工具。
